quest.name: Hells Hath No Fury as a Hippo Scorned
journal:
Maru is searching for a hungry fugitive.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We've got a runaway on our hands, Forename. A hippo runaway, that is...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: One of our 'pots has a really robust appetite, but recently it's been a little too robust. We've started rationin' him─'cause it ain't good to overfeed─but he didn't take well to that an' ran off in a huff.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: One of our Riders spotted him barrelin' towards the jungle─I think he's frustrated an' angry at all of us, but maybe he'll hear reason if it's comin' from you?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Take him some feed as a peace offerin'─we've got three kinds you can choose from. Tell him we ain't tryin' to make him suffer, we just wanna make sure he's healthy...

dialogue.name: HIPPO04568
dialogue.text: Pohhhhhh. Poh, poh-pohhh...

dialogue.name: HIPPO04568
dialogue.text: Pohhh! Poh, poh!!!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The hippo inhales the dried grass with alarming speed, then trots away in the direction of Svarna.

dialogue.name: HIPPO04568
dialogue.text: Poh, po-poh... Pooohhh!!!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The hippo demolishes the vegetables with rapturous gusto, then skips away in the direction of Svarna.

dialogue.name: HIPPO04568
dialogue.text: Pohhh? Poh poh, poh poh poh! Poh...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The hippo masticates Ghasa's formula with a complicated expression of wounded gratitude, before faithfully plodding away in the direction of Svarna.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You should report back to Maru and see if reconciliation has been achieved.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You're back! An' right on the tail of our runaway─I knew he'd come around if you explained it.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Oh, you decided to go with the dried grass blend? I can smell it on your hands...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Dried grass might not seem like enough food for big critters like hippos, but it's actually got a lot of nutrients an' goes easy on the stomach. Stores well too, so it's a handy sort of feed to have around...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Oh, you chose the vegetable mix? Your hands smell like tubers...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Our hippos like the crunch on that one, plus it's got loads of vitamins... We even tried addin' those imported─what're they called? Carrots of happiness? Perks the hippos up every time...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Oh, you brought him Ghasa's special recipe, didn't you? I'd know that fruity smell anywhere...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Our man Ghasa, he loves hippos more than anyone I've ever met. He spent ages comin' up with the perfect combination of nutrients and medicinal herbs to fill our hippos' bellies while keepin' 'em refreshed an' healthy...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Anyroad, all's well that ends well, I guess. Thanks for bein' our mediator─we'll be sure to work out an agreement with our hungry 'pot.
